meanings.definition: Not delinquent in payment of debt.
meanings.sent1: She is always nondelinquent in paying her bills on time.
meanings.sent2: The company has a good reputation for being nondelinquent in their financial obligations.
meanings.sent3: It's a relief to be nondelinquent with my credit card payments.
meanings.sent4: Her nondelinquent behavior towards debt sets a positive example for others.
meanings.sent5: Being nondelinquent with loans can help build a strong credit history.

meanings.definition: A person who has not committed a delinquent act.
meanings.sent1: The school counselor works closely with nondelinquent students to prevent issues.
meanings.sent2: The police officer praised the nondelinquent behavior of the young man.
meanings.sent3: The nondelinquent in the group always keeps things interesting.
meanings.sent4: She stood out as a nondelinquent among her peers.
meanings.sent5: The nondelinquent student was a role model for others in the class.
